create.relation: MATCH (n:<label>),(m:<label>) WHERE n.uid='<uid>' AND m.uid in <set> CREATE (n)-[:KNOWS]->(m);

unique.property: MATCH (n:<label>) WHERE EXISTS(n.<prop>) RETURN DISTINCT n.<prop> AS <prop>, count(n) as numNodes ORDER BY numNodes DESC;
unique.property_PR: MATCH (n:<label>) WHERE EXISTS(n.pagerank) RETURN n.uid AS uid, n.pagerank AS pagerank ORDER BY pagerank DESC;
unique.property_PR_local: MATCH (n:<label>) WHERE n.partition=<part> RETURN n.uid AS uid, n.<prop> AS <prop> ORDER BY <prop> DESC LIMIT <lim>;

PageRank.query: CALL algo.pageRank.stream('<label>', '<rltn>', {dampingFactor:<df>, iterations:<itr>}) Yield nodeId, score RETURN algo.asNode(nodeId).name AS node,score ORDER BY score DESC;
PageRank.query_write: CALL algo.pageRank('<label>', '<rltn>', {iterations:<itr>, dampingFactor:<df>, write: true, writeProperty:'pagerank'});

match.node2: MATCH (n:<label>) WHERE n.uid='<uid1>' or n.uid='<uid2>' RETURN n;
match.list_match: UNWIND <set> AS x MATCH (n:<label>) WHERE n.uid=x RETURN n;
match.neighbours: MATCH (n:<label>{uid:'<uid>'}),(m:<label>) WHERE n.partition=m.partition RETURN DISTINCT m.C_D;
match.edg_outside: MATCH (n:<label>{uid:'<uid>'})-[*1]->(c) WHERE NOT c.C_D='<cid>' RETURN count(c);

CC.query: CALL algo.unionFind.stream('<label>', 'KNOWS', {}) YIELD nodeId,setId RETURN algo.asNode(nodeId).uid AS Node, setId

cluster.nodes: MATCH (n:<label>) WHERE n.C_D CONTAINS '<cid>' RETURN n.uid AS uid;

conductance.M_s: MATCH (n:<label>)-[:KNOWS]->(p:<label>) WHERE n.C_D CONTAINS '<cid>' AND p.C_D CONTAINS '<cid>' RETURN count(*);
conductance.C_s: MATCH (n:<label>)-[:KNOWS]->(p:<label>) WHERE n.C_D CONTAINS '<cid>' XOR p.C_D CONTAINS '<cid>' RETURN count(*);
